nodes.text: Dol Donar's yacht was owned by Governor Dol Donar II. It was large, fast, and well armed. It was destroyed when A-Cee's self-destruct mechanism was activated. All on board were killed, including Donar and the bounty hunter Slyder.
Dol Donar's yacht is canonical as it appears in Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire. However, it has not yet been named.
